results.name: Period 6: repeat [0, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2].
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = (4 - 2*cos(n*Pi/3) - cos(2*n*Pi/3) - cos(n*Pi) - sqrt(3)*sin(n*Pi/3))/3. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 04 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 03 2018
